p: The expansion lists were computed applying the NES 2RA algorithm ( Asnicar et al., 2016) to the pre-processed Vespucci dataset. NES 2RA is based on the PC-algorithm, named after its authors Peter and Clark ( Spirtes and Glymour, 1991), a gaussian graphical model (GGM) that finds causal relationships from observational data. Other GGM have been successfully applied to reconstruct plant regulatory gene networks ( Ma et al., 2007), but the PC-algorithm has been shown to be the most promising for biological applications compared to Neighborhood selection, G-Lasso, and Shrinkage estimation ( Albieri and Didelez, 2014).
